        public static void sendEmail(State state,
                             String subject,
                             String message)
                      throws org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException
        A general method for sending emails.
        Parameters:
        state - a State object containing configuration properties
        subject - email subject
        message - email message
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException - if there is anything wrong sending the email

        message - email message
